numbered_ace_sentences: 1. On average, women are more likely than men to contact their parents multiple times a week.
2. This is true for every aspect of communication.
3. Most young people prefer texting and calling to visiting their parents.
4. Many young people live far away from their parents.
5. If a young person lives far away from the parents, then it is easier for the young person to text the parents or to call the parents.
6. Women are more likely than men to reach out to their parents.
7. I wonder why women are more likely than men to reach out to their parents.
8. I wonder whether this difference is recent.
9. I wonder whether this difference has existed for a long time.
10. I text my parents a lot.
11. I call my parents a lot.
12. My brother texts our parents less than I text our parents.
13. My brother calls our parents less than I call our parents.
14. The graph is accurate for me.
15. The headline is: Does gender impact communication?
